Home » 14S5 Mahāvaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 1 Maggasaṃyutta » 1.4 Paṭipattivagga
1.4.9 Paṭhamabrahmacariyasutta
Maggasaṃyutta
Paṭipattivagga
Paṭhamabrahmacariyasutta
39.
139Sāvatthinidānaṃ. “Brahmacariyañca vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi, brahmacariyaphalāni ca. Taṃ suṇātha. Katamañca, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ? Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, seyyathidaṃ—  sammādiṭṭhi…pe…  sammāsamādhi. Idaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ. Katamāni ca, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaphalāni? Sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattaphalaṃ—  imāni vuccanti, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaphalānī”ti.
140Navamaṃ.
